flags.bit: Bits 31:22 Reserved, must be kept at reset value.
Bit 21 TIM11RST: TIM11 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 20 TIM10RST: TIM10 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 19 TIM9RST: TIM9 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
Bits 18:16 Reserved, always read as 0
Bit 15 ADC3RST: ADC3 interface reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 14 USART1RST: USART1 reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 13 TIM8RST: TIM8 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 12 SPI1RST: SPI1 reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 11 TIM1RST: TIM1 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 10 ADC2RST: ADC 2 interface reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 9 ADC1RST: ADC 1 interface reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 8 IOPGRST: IO port G reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 7 IOPFRST: IO port F reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 6 IOPERST: IO port E reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 5 IOPDRST: IO port D reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 4 IOPCRST: IO port C reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 3 IOPBRST: IO port B reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 2 IOPARST: IO port A reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 1 Reserved, must be kept at reset value.
Bit 0 AFIORST: Alternate function IO reset Set and cleared by software.
